channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to the English Section on hub

item.title: Installing Hugo on PC
item.description: This guide will walk you through the process of installing Hugo on your PC. Windows # Download the latest Hugo release from the official Hugo releases page. Extract the ZIP file to a folder, e.g., C:\Hugo\bin. Add the Hugo executable to your PATH: Right-click on ‘This PC’ and go to ‘Properties’. Click on ‘Advanced system settings’. Click on ‘Environment Variables’. Under ‘System variables’, find the ‘Path’ variable, select it and click ‘Edit’.

item.title: My First Blog Post
item.description: This is my first blog post using Hugo. Hugo is a fast and flexible static site generator built in Go. Why Hugo? # Speed: Hugo is one of the fastest static site generators available. Flexibility: It supports a wide range of content types and output formats. Easy to use: With its simple structure and Markdown support, creating content is a breeze. Stay tuned for more posts about my journey with Hugo!
